testcase.name: To validate dashboard page title when user enter valid login data
testcase.system-out: Given To launch the browser "chrome"........................................passed And To enter the site url "https://tutorialsninja.com/demo/index.php?route=account/login".passed And To enter the uName "binaryrushi@gmail.com"..............................passed And To enter the uPass "salman007"..........................................passed When To click on login button...............................................passed Then To validate the dashboard title "My Account"..........................passed And To logout from the dashboard page.......................................passed And To close the browser....................................................passed
